name: Glen Maddern
bio: Glen Maddern is an independent front-end web developer, consultant & presenter. A reformed backend developer, he now spends his time trying to optimise users' experiences within the browser and the developers' experience in creating them. He's one of the authors of CSS Modules & helps organise CSSConf AU and JSConf AU.

name: Stephanie Rieger
bio: Stephanie is a designer, researcher and closet anthropologist with a passion for the many ways people interact with technology. A mobile industry veteran with a keen eye on emerging technologies, Stephanie speaks at conferences and teaches workshops on design and strategy all over the world. She is also co-founder and principal at yiibu, a small yet perfectly-formed design consultancy that explores the human impact of embedding technology into every day life.
